title: Donation section + navigation link (static Cash App instructions)

requirements.summary: Create a new public Donation section with id="donation", cinematic dark styling, and reveal-on-scroll / reduced-motion-safe animation, using the user-provided text verbatim (including "$WOTWM").
acceptanceCriteria: A new section is rendered on the public site with id="donation".
The section shows a visible heading/title: "Donation".
The donation body content matches the user-provided text verbatim (including "$WOTWM").
The section styling is consistent with existing sections (dark cinematic background, readable typography, spacing).
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion (no mandatory motion effects when reduced motion is enabled).

file_operations.description: Add a new <DonationSection /> component that renders a <section> with stable id="donation", a prominent "Donation" title, and the exact user-provided donation/support text (including the Cash App handle "$WOTWM"). Match existing cinematic dark section patterns (layered background, container spacing, readable typography) and use the existing useRevealOnScroll + usePrefersReducedMotion behavior to ensure reveal animations are reduced-motion-safe. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a "Donation" item to HeaderNav that smooth-scrolls to #donation in both desktop and mobile menus while preserving existing scroll targets.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation includes a "Donation" item on desktop.
Clicking "Donation" smoothly scrolls to the section with id="donation".
All existing nav items (Story, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News) still work and scroll correctly.

file_operations.description: Extend the existing navLinks list to include a new item { href: '#donation', label: 'Donation' } and ensure the existing scrollToSection helper continues to smooth-scroll correctly for both desktop and mobile menus without changing existing targets. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Wire the Donation section into the homepage flow in App.tsx for both normal public view and Pro mode, near the end of the page before the Footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Donation section renders in the normal (non-admin) view.
Donation section renders in Pro mode view as well.
No existing sections disappear or lose their current ids/scroll behavior after inserting the Donation section.

file_operations.description: Import and render <DonationSection /> in the main homepage section list and in the Pro mode section list, placing it near the end of the page (e.g., after NewsUpdatesSection and before <Footer />) while preserving existing section order, ids, and behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
